content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Pipe group at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before starting operations.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NO_FUEL state.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NOT_CONNECTED state.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items to operate.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS state.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to operate.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NO_INGREDIENTS state.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK state.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
